Welcome to SciKit-Learn Lab's documentation!
============================================

There are two primary means of using SKLL: :doc:`the Python API <skll>` and by
using :doc:`the run_experiment script <run_experiment>`.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   run_experiment
   skll
